# Trial 1
## Load Data
```{r}
# trial 1
df1_sheets = import_list("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/1/1.xlsx")

df1_base = df1_sheets[[1]]
df1_4m = df1_sheets[[2]]
df1_3m = df1_sheets[[3]]
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df1_base_clean = df1_base %>% slice(-1)
df1_4m_clean = df1_4m %>% slice(-1)
df1_3m_clean = df1_3m %>% slice(-1)

# Step 2: Assign treatment group
assign_treatment = function(row) {
  if (row <= 114) return("True Acupuncture + Placebo")
  else if (row <= 228) return("Metformin + Sham Acupuncture")
  else return("Sham Acupuncture + Placebo")
}

# Step 3: Join baseline + 4-month + 7-month
df1_combined = df1_base_clean %>%
  mutate(row_index = row_number()) %>%
  bind_cols(
    df1_4m_clean %>% select(-Group, -`Patient number`) %>% rename_with(~ paste0("m4_", .x)),
    df1_3m_clean %>% select(-Group, -`Patient number`) %>% rename_with(~ paste0("m7_", .x))
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = sapply(row_index, assign_treatment),
    ID = row_number()
  )

# Step 4: Create new labeled variables
df1_final = df1_combined %>%
  mutate(
    # Primary
    YP_delta_HOMA_IR_4m = as.numeric(`m4_HOMA-IR`) - as.numeric(`HOMA-IR`),

    # Related (after primary)
    post_YP_delta_HOMA_IR_7m = as.numeric(`m7_HOMA-IR`) - as.numeric(`HOMA-IR`),

    # Secondary outcomes
    YS_delta_BMI_4m = as.numeric(`m4_BMI`) - as.numeric(BMI),
    YS_delta_WHR_4m = as.numeric(`m4_WHR`) - as.numeric(WHR),
    YS_delta_Acne_4m = as.numeric(`m4_Acne`) - as.numeric(Acne),
    YS_delta_Hirsutism_4m = as.numeric(`m4_Hirsutism`) - as.numeric(Hirsutism),
    YS_delta_FPG_4m = as.numeric(`m4_FPG`) - as.numeric(FPG),
    YS_delta_FINS_4m = as.numeric(`m4_FINS`) - as.numeric(FINS),
    YS_delta_GlucoseAUC_4m = as.numeric(`m4_Glucose AUC`) - as.numeric(`Glucose AUC`),
    YS_delta_InsulinAUC_4m = as.numeric(`m4_Insulin AUC`) - as.numeric(`Insulin AUC`),
    YS_delta_HOMA_beta_4m = as.numeric(`m4_HOMA-β`) - as.numeric(`HOMA-β`),
    YS_delta_Cpeptide_4m = as.numeric(`m4_C-Peptide`) - as.numeric(`C-Peptide`),
    YS_delta_HbA1c_4m = as.numeric(`m4_HbA1c`) - as.numeric(HbA1c),
    YS_delta_LH_FSH_4m = as.numeric(`m4_LH/FSH`) - as.numeric(`LH/FSH`),
    YS_delta_TotalT_4m = as.numeric(`m4_Total T`) - as.numeric(`Total T`),
    YS_delta_FAI_4m = as.numeric(`m4_FAI`) - as.numeric(FAI),
    
     # Post-secondary changes at 7 months
    post_YS_delta_BMI_7m      = as.numeric(`m7_BMI`)      - as.numeric(BMI),
    post_YS_delta_WHR_7m      = as.numeric(`m7_WHR`)      - as.numeric(WHR),
    post_YS_delta_Acne_7m     = as.numeric(`m7_Acne`)     - as.numeric(Acne),
    post_YS_delta_Hirsutism_7m= as.numeric(`m7_Hirsutism`)- as.numeric(Hirsutism),
    post_YS_delta_FPG_7m      = as.numeric(`m7_FPG`)      - as.numeric(FPG),
    post_YS_delta_FINS_7m     = as.numeric(`m7_FINS`)     - as.numeric(FINS),
    post_YS_delta_GlucoseAUC_7m   = as.numeric(`m7_Glucose AUC`)   - as.numeric(`Glucose AUC`),
    post_YS_delta_InsulinAUC_7m   = as.numeric(`m7_Insulin AUC`)   - as.numeric(`Insulin AUC`),
    post_YS_delta_HOMA_beta_7m    = as.numeric(`m7_HOMA-β`)   - as.numeric(`HOMA-β`),
    post_YS_delta_Cpeptide_7m     = as.numeric(`m7_C-Peptide`)- as.numeric(`C-Peptide`),
    post_YS_delta_HbA1c_7m        = as.numeric(`m7_HbA1c`)    - as.numeric(HbA1c)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    # Baseline outcomes become covariates
    X_HOMA_IR_0m      = as.numeric(`HOMA-IR`),
    X_BMI_0m          = as.numeric(BMI),
    X_WHR_0m          = as.numeric(WHR),
    X_Acne_0m         = as.numeric(Acne),
    X_Hirsutism_0m    = as.numeric(Hirsutism),
    X_FPG_0m          = as.numeric(FPG),
    X_FINS_0m         = as.numeric(FINS),
    X_GlucoseAUC_0m   = as.numeric(`Glucose AUC`),
    X_InsulinAUC_0m   = as.numeric(`Insulin AUC`),
    X_HOMA_beta_0m    = as.numeric(`HOMA-β`),
    X_Cpeptide_0m     = as.numeric(`C-Peptide`),
    X_HbA1c_0m        = as.numeric(HbA1c),
    X_LH_FSH_0m       = as.numeric(`LH/FSH`),
    X_TotalT_0m       = as.numeric(`Total T`),
    X_FAI_0m          = as.numeric(FAI),

    # Other covariates
    X_Age_0m          = as.numeric(Age),
    X_Weight_0m       = as.numeric(Weight),
    X_Waist_0m        = as.numeric(Waist),
    X_TG_0m           = as.numeric(TG),
    X_HDL_0m          = as.numeric(HDL),
    X_LDL_0m          = as.numeric(LDL),
    X_CHOL_0m         = as.numeric(CHOL),
    X_ApoA1_0m        = as.numeric(`ApoA-1`),
    X_ApoB_0m         = as.numeric(ApoB)
  ) %>%
  mutate(Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "Sham Acupuncture + Placebo")) %>%
  
  select(
    Treatment,
    YP_delta_HOMA_IR_4m,
    post_YP_delta_HOMA_IR_7m,
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("post_YS"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```

```{r}
write_rds(df1_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial1.rds")
```

# Trial 2
## Load Data
```{r}
# trial 2
df2 = read_sav("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/2/2.sav")
```


## Cleaning
```{r}
df2_final = df2 %>%
  # Set treatment labels
  mutate(
    Treatment = case_when(
      NOD == 1 ~ "Ivermectin+Doxycycline",
      NOD == 0 ~ "Placebo"
    )
  ) %>%

  # Rename according to cleaning protocol
  rename(
    # Primary outcomes
    YP_recovery_time       = Sym_Recover,
    YP_early_7d            = res_7day,
    YP_late_12d            = Res_12day,

    # Secondary outcomes
    YS_severity_worsen     = Conversion_binary,
    YS_pos_14d             = Pers_positiv,

    # Covariates
    X_agegrp_0d               = Age_group,
    X_sex_0d                  = Sex,
    X_fever_0d                = Fever,
    X_cough_0d                = Cough,
    X_respdiff_0d             = Resp_dist,
    X_diabetes_0d             = Diabete,
    X_hyperten_0d             = Hypertension,
    X_comorb_0d               = Co_mor,
  ) %>%

  # Replace placeholder missing values with NA
  mutate(across(where(~is.numeric(.) || is.integer(.) || is.logical(.)), ~na_if(., 99))) %>%
  
  mutate(Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "Placebo")) %>%
  
  mutate(
        X_agegrp_0d = factor(X_agegrp_0d,
                         levels = c(1, 2, 3),
                         labels = c("less than 40", "40-60", ">60"),
                         ordered = TRUE),
        across(c(X_sex_0d, X_fever_0d, X_cough_0d, X_respdiff_0d, X_comorb_0d, 
                 X_diabetes_0d, X_hyperten_0d, YP_early_7d, YP_late_12d,
                 YS_severity_worsen, YS_pos_14d), as_factor)
    ) %>% 

  # Select and reorder columns
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```


## Output Data
```{r}
# write trial 2
write_csv(df2_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial2.csv")
write_rds(df2_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial2.rds")
```

# Trial 3
## Load Data
```{r}
# trial 3
df3 = read_csv("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/3/3.csv")
```



## Cleaning
```{r}
df3_final = df3 %>% 
  # 2. Recode treatment
  rename(Treatment = alert) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = case_when(
      Treatment == 1 ~ "Alert",
      Treatment == 0 ~ "Usual Care",
      TRUE           ~ NA_character_
    ),
    # derive the “inpatient or hospice” complement
    YS_discharge_inpatient_hospice = case_when(
      discharge_to_home == 0 ~ 1L,
      discharge_to_home == 1 ~ 0L,
      TRUE                  ~ NA_integer_
    )
  ) %>%
  
  # 3. Primary & secondary outcomes per the paper’s Table
  rename(
    YP_composite_event       = composite_outcome,
    YP_composite_time        = time_to_composite_outcome,
    
    YS_aki_progression_event = aki_progression14,
    YS_dialysis_event        = dialysis14,
    YS_death_event           = death14,
    YS_discharge_home        = discharge_to_home,
    YS_los_since_alert       = los_since_alert
  ) %>%
  
  # 4. Baseline covariates (as in Table 1) → prefix X_ and suffix _0m,
  #    stripping any “_at_rand” from the original name
  rename_with(
    ~ paste0("X_", sub("_at_rand$", "", .), "_0m"),
    .cols = any_of(c(
      # demographics & flags
      "hospital",
      "age", "age_over_90",
      "sex",
      "race",
      "ethnicity",
      # admission service & location
      "admit_medical",
      "admit_surgical",
      "location_icu",
      "location_ed",
      "location_ward",
      # labs & vitals at randomization
      "creat_at_rand",
      "bun_at_rand",
      "wbcc_at_rand",
      "egfr_at_rand",
      "sodium_at_rand",
      "potassium_at_rand",
      "pulse_at_rand",
      "resp_at_rand",
      "systolic_at_rand",
      "diastolic_at_rand",
      # comorbidities & scores
      "chf",
      "hypertension",
      "diabetes",
      "malignancy",
      "ckd",
      "copd",
      "depression",
      "liver_disease",
      "icu",
      "sofa",
      "elx_score"
    ))
  ) %>%
  mutate(Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "Usual Care")) %>%
  mutate(across(
    where(~ is.numeric(.) && all(na.omit(unique(.)) %in% c(0, 1))),
    ~ factor(., levels = c(0, 1))
  )) %>%
  
  # 6. Final column order: Treatment, YP_, pre_YP_, post_YP_, YS_, X_
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YP_"),
    starts_with("post_YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
  
```



## Output Data
```{r}
# wrtie trial 3
write_csv(df3_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial3.csv")
write_rds(df3_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial3.rds")
```



# Trial 4
## Load Data
```{r}
# trial 4
df4 = read_xlsx("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/4/4.xlsx")
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df4_final = df4 %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  rename(
    treatment = group,
    
    # Baseline covariates
    X_FIB4_0w    = fib4,
    X_APRI_0w    = apri,
    X_VD_0w      = vd0,
    X_AST_0w     = ast0,
    X_ALT_0w     = alt0,
    X_Plt_0w     = plt0,
    X_Age_0w     = age,
    X_Sex_0w     = sex,
    X_BMI_0w     = bmi,
    
    # Primary outcome baselines
    X_TGF_0w  = tgf0,
    X_TIMP_0w = timp0,
    X_MMP_0w  = mmp0,
    X_P3NP_0w = p3np0
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = dplyr::recode(treatment,
                       "A" = "VD",
                       "B" = "Placebo"),
    
    # Primary outcome deltas (6-week − baseline)
    YP_delta_TGF_6w   = as.numeric(tgf6) - as.numeric(X_TGF_0w),
    YP_delta_TIMP_6w  = as.numeric(timp6) - as.numeric(X_TIMP_0w),
    YP_delta_MMP_6w   = as.numeric(mmp6) - as.numeric(X_MMP_0w),
    YP_delta_P3NP_6w  = as.numeric(p3np6) - as.numeric(X_P3NP_0w)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "Placebo"),
    X_Age_0w = factor(X_Age_0w, levels = c(
      "31-40", "41-50", "51-60", "61-70", "71-80"
    ), ordered = TRUE),
    X_Sex_0w = factor(X_Sex_0w)
  ) %>%

  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )

```


## Output Data
```{r}
# write trial 4
write_csv(df4_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial4.csv")
write_rds(df4_final, "cleaned_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/trial4.rds")
```

# Trial 5

```{r}
df5 = read_csv("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/5/5.csv", na = c("", "NaN"))
```

## Cleaning

```{r}
df5_final = df5 %>%
  rename(Treatment = alert) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = case_when(
      Treatment == 1 ~ "Alert",
      Treatment == 0 ~ "Usual Care",
      TRUE           ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  
  # 3. Primary & secondary outcomes (with day/hour suffixes)
  rename(
    YP_composite_14d           = composite_outcome,
    
    YS_death_14d               = death14,
    YS_dialysis_14d            = dialysis14,
    YS_aki_progression_14d     = aki_progression14,
    YS_inpatient_mortality     = inpatient_mortality,
    YS_inpatient_dialysis      = inpatient_dialysis,
    YS_progression_stage2_14d  = progression2,
    YS_progression_stage3_14d  = progression3,
    YS_acearb_stopped_24h      = acearb_stopped24,
    YS_nsaid_stopped_24h       = nsaid_stopped24,
    YS_ppi_stopped_24h         = ppi_stopped24,
    YS_no_nsaid_during_aki     = no_nsaid_during_aki,
    YS_no_ppi_during_aki       = no_ppi_during_aki,
    YS_no_acearb_during_aki    = no_acearb_during_aki,
    YS_opioid_14d              = opioid,
    YS_ventorder_14d           = ventorder,
    YS_transfuserbc_14d        = transfuserbc,
    YS_los_since_alert         = los_since_alert,
    YS_readmit_30d             = readmit30,
    YS_max_pain_score_14d      = max_pain_score14,
    YS_duration_of_alert       = duration_of_alert,
    YS_duration_of_aki         = duration_of_aki,
    YS_aki_stage_14d           = aki_stage14
  ) %>%
  
  # 4. Baseline covariates → prefix X_, strip "_at_rand", suffix "_0m"
  rename_with(
    ~ paste0("X_", sub("_at_rand$", "", .), "_0m"),
    .cols = any_of(c(
      "hospital",
      "age", "age_over_90",
      "sex",
      "race",
      "icu_at_rand", "ward_at_rand", "er_at_rand",
      "num_med", "on_acearb", "on_nsaid", "on_ppi",
      "admit_medical", "admit_surgical",
      "ckd_pmhx", "chf_elx_pmhx", "pulm_disease_elx_pmhx",
      "diabetes_elx_pmhx", "htn_elx_pmhx", "malignancy_elx_pmhx",
      "liverdisease_elx_pmhx", "elx_score_pmhx",
      "creat_at_rand", "mincreat48_prior", "mincreat7_prior",
      "admit_creatinine", "baseline_creat",
      "aniongap_at_rand", "bicarbonate_at_rand", "bun_at_rand",
      "chloride_at_rand", "egfr_at_admit", "hemoglobin_at_rand",
      "plateletcount_at_rand", "potassium_at_rand", "sodium_at_rand",
      "wbcc_at_rand", "systolic_at_rand", "diastolic_at_rand",
      "pulse_at_rand", "resp_at_rand", "spo2_at_rand",
      "temp_at_rand", "sofa_at_rand"
    ))
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "Usual Care"),
    across(
      where(~ is.numeric(.) && all(na.omit(unique(.)) %in% c(0, 1))),
      ~ factor(., levels = c(0, 1))
    ),
    X_hospital_0m = factor(X_hospital_0m)
  ) %>% 
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YP_"),
    starts_with("post_YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```

# Trial 6
## Load Data
```{r}
# trial 6
df6_alloc = read_excel("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/6/6.xlsx", sheet = "1. Allocation")
df6_imt   = read_excel("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/6/6.xlsx", sheet = "2. IMT")
df6_other = read_excel("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/6/6.xlsx", sheet = "3. Other data")
```


## Cleaning
```{r}
df6 = df6_alloc %>%
  inner_join(df6_imt, by = c("ID", "allocation")) %>%
  inner_join(df6_other, by = "ID")

df6[df6 == "."] = NA

df6_final = df6 %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = case_when(
      allocation == 1 ~ "Sitagliptin",
      allocation == 2 ~ "Conventional"
    ),

        # Primary outcome
    pre_YP_delta_CCA_IMT_12m = as.numeric(x12m_right_cca_mean_imt) - as.numeric(x0m_right_cca_mean_imt),
    YP_delta_CCA_IMT_24m     = as.numeric(x24m_right_cca_mean_imt) - as.numeric(x0m_right_cca_mean_imt),
    X_cca_imt_0m             = as.numeric(x0m_right_cca_mean_imt),

    # Secondary outcomes
    YS_delta_hba1c_12m       = as.numeric(hba1c_ngsp_12m) - as.numeric(hba1c_ngsp_0m),
    YS_delta_hba1c_24m       = as.numeric(hba1c_ngsp_24m) - as.numeric(hba1c_ngsp_0m),
    X_hba1c_0m               = as.numeric(hba1c_ngsp_0m),

    YS_delta_fbg_12m         = as.numeric(fbs_12m) - as.numeric(fbs_0m),
    YS_delta_fbg_24m         = as.numeric(fbs_24m) - as.numeric(fbs_0m),
    X_fbg_0m                 = as.numeric(fbs_0m),

    YS_delta_insulin_12m     = as.numeric(insulin_12m) - as.numeric(insulin_0m),
    YS_delta_insulin_24m     = as.numeric(insulin_24m) - as.numeric(insulin_0m),
    X_insulin_0m             = as.numeric(insulin_0m),

    YS_delta_creatinine_12m  = as.numeric(creatinine_12m) - as.numeric(creatinine_0m),

    YS_delta_albumin_24m     = as.numeric(urinary_albumin_24m) - as.numeric(urinary_albumin_0m),

    X_cystatin_c_0m          = as.numeric(cystatin_c_0m),

    X_weight_0m              = as.numeric(body_weight_0m),

    YS_delta_1_5ag_12m       = as.numeric(x1_5ag_12m) - as.numeric(x1_5ag_0m),
    YS_delta_1_5ag_24m       = as.numeric(x1_5ag_24m) - as.numeric(x1_5ag_0m),
    X_1_5ag_0m               = as.numeric(x1_5ag_0m),

    YS_delta_sdldl_12m       = as.numeric(small_dense_ldl_12m) - as.numeric(small_dense_ldl_0m),
    YS_delta_sdldl_24m       = as.numeric(small_dense_ldl_24m) - as.numeric(small_dense_ldl_0m),
    X_sdldl_0m               = as.numeric(small_dense_ldl_0m),

    YS_delta_adipo_12m       = as.numeric(hmw_adiponectin_12m) - as.numeric(hmw_adiponectin_0m),
    YS_delta_adipo_24m       = as.numeric(hmw_adiponectin_24m) - as.numeric(hmw_adiponectin_0m),
    X_adipo_0m               = as.numeric(hmw_adiponectin_0m),

    YS_delta_rlpc_12m        = as.numeric(rlp_c_12m) - as.numeric(rlp_c_0m),
    YS_delta_rlpc_24m        = as.numeric(rlp_c_24m) - as.numeric(rlp_c_0m),
    X_rlpc_0m                = as.numeric(rlp_c_0m),

    # Additional baseline covariates used in ANCOVA
    X_age_0m                    = age_x,

    X_statin_0m                 = statin,

    X_hba1c_ancova_0m           = as.numeric(al_hb_a1c_jds),
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
convert_to_days = function(x) {
  if (is.na(x)) {
    return(NA_real_)
  }
  x_lower = tolower(as.character(x))
  # asymptomatic → 0 days
  if (str_detect(x_lower, "asymptom")) {
    return(0)
  }
  # pull out any numbers (handles “6-7”) 
  nums = as.numeric(unlist(str_extract_all(x_lower, "\\d+\\.?\\d*")))
  if (length(nums) == 0) {
    return(NA_real_)
  }
  # months → average * 30
  if (str_detect(x_lower, "month")) {
    return(mean(nums) * 30)
  }
  # otherwise treat as days
  return(nums[1])
}
```

```{r}
    YS_final_discharge   = if_else(Final_out == "Discharged", 1L, 0L),
    YS_ICU               = if_else(tolower(ICU) == "yes", 1L, 0L),
    YS_intubation_mv     = if_else(tolower(Intub_MV) == "yes", 1L, 0L)
  ) %>%
  # now compute onset‐of‐symptoms in days
```

```{r}
    YS_UTEROTONICOS     = uterotonicos,      # any additional uterotonics
    YS_HB_CHG           = Hbdiff,            # Δ hemoglobin pre→post

    # Optional vitals (if you want them as secondary, otherwise drop these)
    YS_SYSBP_30min      = presion_sist_30,   # systolic BP @ 30 min
    YS_DIASBP_30min     = presion_diast_30,  # diastolic BP @ 30 min
    YS_HR_30min         = frecuencia_30,      # HR @ 30 min
    YS_SYSBP_60min      = presion_sist_60,   # systolic BP @ 60 min
    YS_DIASBP_60min     = presion_diast_60,  # diastolic BP @ 60 min
    YS_HR_60min         = frecuencia_60,      # HR @ 60 min

    # --- Baseline covariates ---
    X_AGE_0min               = edad,              # maternal age (years)
    X_PARITY_0min            = numembarazos,      # number of pregnancies
    X_HB_BASELINE_0min       = Nivel_hb,          # hemoglobin on admission
    X_INDUCTION_0min         = induccion,         # labor induction (yes/no)
    X_SI_BASELINE_0min       = SI_baseline        # baseline shock index
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    YP_PPH500 = factor(YP_PPH500),
    Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "IM injection"),
    across(c(YS_UTEROTONICOS, YS_PPH1000), as_factor), 
    X_INDUCTION_0min = factor(X_INDUCTION_0min)
  ) %>% 
  # 3. Reorder columns as requested
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YP_"),   # (none here)
    starts_with("post_YP_"),  # (none here)
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  ) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Treatment))
```

# Trial 19
## Load Data
```{r}
df19 = read_xls("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/19/19.xls")
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df19_final = df19 %>%
  rename(
    Treatment               = `OPERATIVE METHOD`,
    X_CREATININE_0d         = `PREOPERATIVE CREATININE`,
    X_RECIPIENT_AGE_YEARS_0d   = `RECIPIENT AGE (YEARS)`,
    X_RECIPIENT_GENDER_0d      = `RECIPIENT GENDER`,
    X_RECIPIENT_DIAGNOSIS_0d   = `RECIPIENT DIAGNOSIS`,
    X_CHILD_PUGH_SCORE_0d      = `CHILD-PUGH SCORE`,
    X_MELD_SCORE_0d            = `MELD SCORE`,
    X_DONOR_AGE_YEARS_0d       = `DONOR AGE`,
    X_DONOR_GENDER_0d          = `DONOR GENDER`,
    X_DONOR_DIAGNOSIS_0d       = `DONOR DIAGNOSIS`,
    X_DONOR_WEIGHT_0d       = `DONOR WEIGHT (kg)`,
    X_GRAFT_SHARING_0d         = `GRAFT SHARING`,
    YP_FHVP_CVP_GRADIENT    = `FHVP-CVP GRADIENT (mmHg)`,
    YS_CREATININE_1d        = `1PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_2d        = `2PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_3d        = `3PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_5d        = `5PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_6d        = `6PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_7d        = `7PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_14d       = `14PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_21d       = `21PO CREATININE`,
    YS_CREATININE_28d       = `28PO CREATININE`,
    YS_MASSIVE_ASCITES      = `POSTOPERATIVE MASSIVE ASCITIS`
  ) %>%
  # 2. Derive ARF prevalence up to 28 days per RIFLE–AKIN “Risk” (≥1.5×baseline or Δ≥0.3)
  rowwise() %>%
  separate(X_CHILD_PUGH_SCORE_0d,
           into = c("X_CHILD_PUGH_CLASS_0d", "X_CHILD_PUGH_SCORE_0d"),
           sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(
    X_CHILD_PUGH_SCORE_0d = as.numeric(X_CHILD_PUGH_SCORE_0d)
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref = "Conventional"),
    
    across(c(
      X_RECIPIENT_GENDER_0d,
      X_RECIPIENT_DIAGNOSIS_0d,
      X_CHILD_PUGH_CLASS_0d,
      X_DONOR_GENDER_0d,
      X_GRAFT_SHARING_0d,
      X_DONOR_DIAGNOSIS_0d,
      YS_MASSIVE_ASCITES
    ), as_factor)
  ) %>% 
  # 3. Keep one‐row-per-patient with only Treatment, YP_, YS_, and X_ columns
  select(
    Treatment,
    YP_FHVP_CVP_GRADIENT,
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```

```{r}
df22_final = df22 %>%

    # Treatment variable

    # Secondary outcomes - Prenatal leave

      `Stop working before delivery?` == "No, I worked up til time of delivery" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_prenatal_weeks = as.numeric(`Weeks of antenatal leave`),
    
    # Secondary outcomes - Postnatal leave
    YS_postnatal_any = factor(case_when(
      `Took postpartum leave?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Took postpartum leave?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_postnatal_8wks = factor(reta8wks),
    YS_postnatal_weeks = coalesce(
      as.numeric(`Weeks of postpartum leave`),
      as.numeric(`Number of paid weeks postpartum leave (combined for those returned and not yet returned to work)`)
    ),
    
    # Secondary outcomes - Tool utilization
    YS_remembered_tool = factor(case_when(
      `Remember getting tool?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Remember getting tool?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_read_tool = factor(case_when(
      `Read or referred to tool?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Read or referred to tool?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_times_looked = factor(`Number of many times looked at tool`),
    YS_tool_easy = factor(`Tool easy to understand?`),
    YS_tool_useful = factor(`Usefulness of tool`),
    YS_found_answers = factor(case_when(
      `Referred to the tool to find answers to questions?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Referred to the tool to find answers to questions?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_learned_new = factor(case_when(
      `Learn anything new from tool?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Learn anything new from tool?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_helped_plan = factor(case_when(
      `Did tool help you plan maternity leave?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Did tool help you plan maternity leave?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_changed_plans = factor(case_when(
      `Did you change your maternity leave plans based on information from tool?` == "Yes" ~ 1,
      `Did you change your maternity leave plans based on information from tool?` == "No" ~ 0,

    )),
    YS_took_to_meeting = factor(case_when(

    )),
    YS_called_numbers = factor(case_when(

      `Called any phone numbers or visit any websites listed on tool?` == "No" ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )),
    YS_prior_knowledge = factor(`BEFORE received tool, how much knew about maternity leave?`),
    
    # Covariates - Demographics (baseline, so _0w suffix)
    X_age_0w = as.numeric(`Mother's age at enrollment in study`),
    X_age_cat_0w = factor(`Age (2 categories)`),
    X_race_white_0w = factor(ifelse(is.na(`Self-reported race/ethnicity--White or Caucasian...150`), 0, `Self-reported race/ethnicity--White or Caucasian...150`)),
    X_race_black_0w = factor(ifelse(is.na(`Self-reported race/ethnicity--Black or African American...151`), 0, `Self-reported race/ethnicity--Black or African American...151`)),
    X_race_hispanic_0w = factor(ifelse(is.na(`Self-reported race/ethnicity--Latino or Hispanic...152`), 0, `Self-reported race/ethnicity--Latino or Hispanic...152`)),
    X_race_asian_0w = factor(ifelse(is.na(`Self-reported race/ethnicity--Asian...153`), 0, `Self-reported race/ethnicity--Asian...153`)),

    X_race_pacific_islander_0w = factor(ifelse(is.na(`Self-reported race/ethnicity--Other Pacific Islander...167`), 0, `Self-reported race/ethnicity--Other Pacific Islander...167`)),
    X_race_other_0w = factor(ifelse(is.na(`Self-reported race/ethnicity--Other...169`), 0, `Self-reported race/ethnicity--Other...169`)),
    X_education_0w = factor(`Highest level of education completed`),
```

```{r}
df26_final = df26 %>%

  mutate(

    pre_YP_delta_Adherence_3m = Adherenceindex3mthsstd - X_Adherence_0m,
    YP_optimal_adherence_6m  = `Adherence@6mths_binary`,

  ) %>%

  # 4. Secondary outcomes at 6 months

    YS_delta_weight_6m      = `Weight@6months` - X_weight_0m,
    YS_delta_TB_status_6m   = `TBStatus@6months` - X_TB_status_0m,

             X_Ethnicity_0m, X_Socialsupport_0m, X_TB_status_0m, X_OI_index_0m), as_factor)

  select(
```

# Trial 27
## Load Data
```{r}
df27 = read_xls("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/27/27.xls", skip = 1)
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df27 = df27 %>%
  mutate(across(where(~ is.character(.) | is.factor(.)), 
                ~ na_if(., "missing data")))
df27_final = df27 %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment                    = Randomisation,
    YP_bleeding_text             = `Main Criterion  (GAILLARD, MD)`,
    YP_surgical_problem_bleeding = `Surgical problem due to bleading`,
    YS_surgery_duration_min      = as.numeric(`Surgery duration (min)`),
    YS_vent_settings_changes     = as.numeric(`Nb of modificaton of ventilatory setting`),
    YS_vent_mode_modification    = `Modification of ventilatory mode`,
    YS_hypoxemia_episodes        = `Nb of episodes with SpO2<92%`,
    YS_recruitment_maneuvers     = `Nb of recrutement maneuvers`,
    YS_min_SpO2                  = as.numeric(`Minimal SpO2`),
    YS_pain_PACU                 = as.numeric(`Tolerance PACU`),
    YS_endocrine_status_3m       = as.numeric(`Endocrine healing`),

    X_Tv_0d                         = Tv,
    X_FiO2_0d                       = as.numeric(Fio2),
    X_AI_0d                         = as.numeric(AI),
    X_Rate_0d                       = Rate
  ) %>%
  # 2. Recode treatment and bleeding scale
  mutate(
    Treatment = recode(Treatment, VVC = "VCV", VPC = "PCV"),

    # 7-level score: 1=minimal, 3=low, 5=no change, 7=change; intermediates 2,4,6 for “very weak”, “medium”, etc. 
    YP_bleeding_score = case_when(
      YP_bleeding_text == "minimal (almost nil)"                                             ~ 2L,
      YP_bleeding_text == "very weak"                                                        ~ 3L,
      YP_bleeding_text == "weak"                                                             ~ 4L,
      YP_bleeding_text == "medium"                                                           ~ 5L,
      YP_bleeding_text == "important without modifying the conduct of the surgical procedure" ~ 6L,
      YP_bleeding_text == "important and modifying the conduct of the surgical procedure"     ~ 7L,
      TRUE                                                                                   ~ NA_integer_
    ),

    # 3-category grouping: 1–3=mild, 4–5=moderate, 6–7=major :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
    YP_bleeding_category3 = case_when(
      YP_bleeding_score %in% 1:3 ~ "mild",
      YP_bleeding_score %in% 4:5 ~ "moderate",
      YP_bleeding_score %in% 6:7 ~ "major",
      TRUE                       ~ NA_character_
    ),
    Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref="VCV"),
    across(c(YP_surgical_problem_bleeding, YP_bleeding_text, YP_bleeding_category3, 
             YS_vent_mode_modification, YS_hypoxemia_episodes, YS_recruitment_maneuvers,
             ), as_factor)
  ) %>%
  # 3. Keep only randomized patients
  filter(!is.na(Treatment)) %>%
  # 4. Select and order final columns
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```

```{r}
      Treatment == 1 ~ "Edu+Visit",
      TRUE          ~ NA_character_
    ),

             X_RxHTN_0m, X_ContrSBP_0m, X_ContrDBP_0m, X_ControlledBP_0m), as_factor)
  ) %>%
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP"),
    starts_with("YS"),
    starts_with("X")
  )
```

# Trial 30
## Load Data
```{r}
df30_sheets = import_list("raw_data/Non_Clustered_RCT/30/30.xlsx")
df30_sheets = lapply(df30_sheets, function(df) {
  df %>%
    # 1) only replace the literal string "NA" in character columns
    mutate(across(where(is.character), ~ na_if(.,"NA"))) %>%
    # 2) re-guess every column’s type, turning numeric-looking ones back to numeric
    type_convert(na = "NA")
})

# then pull them back out as before
df30_demo      = df30_sheets[[1]]
df30_ceq       = df30_sheets[[2]]
df30_ec        = df30_sheets[[3]]
df30_sd        = df30_sheets[[4]]
df30_adherence = df30_sheets[[5]]
df30_dbs       = df30_sheets[[6]]
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df30_final = df30_demo %>%
  # 1) recode Treatment and pick baseline covariates
  mutate(Treatment = case_when(
    Condition == "Pool"           ~ "Pool-REST",
    Condition == "Pool Preferred" ~ "Pool-REST preferred",
    Condition == "Control"        ~ "Chair-REST",
    TRUE                          ~ NA_character_
  )) %>%
  select(ID, Treatment,
         X_Sex_0d            = Sex,
         X_Psychotropics_0d  = Psychotropics,
         X_Education_0d      = Education,
         X_Age_0d            = Age,
         X_OASIS_0d          = OASIS.Baseline,
         X_PHQ9_0d           = PHQ9.Baseline,
         X_ASI_0d            = ASI.Baseline) %>%
  
  # 2) primary YP_Adherence (with NA if any missing)
  left_join(
    df30_adherence %>%
      mutate(Completed = case_when(
        Completed_Visit == "Yes" ~ 1,
        Completed_Visit == "No"  ~ 0,
        TRUE                     ~ NA_real_
      )) %>%
      group_by(ID) %>%
      summarise(
        YP_Adherence = if (any(is.na(Completed))) NA_real_ else mean(Completed)
      ) %>%
      ungroup(),
    by = "ID"
  ) %>%
  
  # 3) CEQ secondary outcomes
  left_join(
    df30_ceq %>%
      rename(
        YS_Credibility1 = Credibility_1,
        YS_Credibility2 = Credibility_2,
        YS_Credibility3 = Credibility_3,
        YS_Expectancy   = Expectancy
      ),
    by = "ID"
  ) %>%
  
  # 4) Session‐duration secondary outcome
  left_join(
    df30_sd %>%
      group_by(ID) %>%
      summarise(YS_MeanDuration = mean(Duration)) %>%
      ungroup(),
    by = "ID"
  ) %>%
  
  # 5) bring in raw days‐between data
  left_join(
    df30_dbs %>%
      rename(
        X_DaysSinceBaseline = DaysSinceBaselineFloat,
        X_DaysSince1        = DaysSinceFloat1,
        X_DaysSince2        = DaysSinceFloat2,
        X_DaysSince3        = DaysSinceFloat3,
        X_DaysSince4        = DaysSinceFloat4,
        X_DaysSince5        = DaysSinceFloat5
      ),
    by = "ID"
  ) %>%
  
  # 6) dropout & mean frequency from dbs
  mutate(
    # dropout if any NA in the 5 session‐intervals
    YS_Dropout = if_else(
      rowSums(is.na(select(., X_DaysSince1:X_DaysSince5))) > 0, 
      1L, 
      0L
    )
  ) %>%
  
  # 7) adverse‐event counts & overall event rating
  left_join(
    df30_ec %>%
      group_by(ID) %>%
      summarise(
        YS_AdverseCount = sum(Response < 0),
        YS_EventMean    = mean(Response)
      ) %>%
      ungroup(),
    by = "ID"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = relevel(factor(Treatment), ref="Chair-REST"),
    across(c(X_Sex_0d, X_Psychotropics_0d, X_Age_0d, YS_Dropout), as_factor)
  ) %>% 
  
  # 8) drop ID and order columns: Treatment → YP_ → YS_ → X_
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )

```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df31_final = df31 %>% 
  transmute(
    # Treatment variable
    Treatment = factor(case_when(
      intervention == "TIV" ~ "TIV",
      intervention == "placebo" ~ "Placebo",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    ), levels = c("Placebo", "TIV")),
    
    # Primary outcome - Time to influenza B infection (time-to-event)
    YP_survival_time = as.numeric(surv_time),
    YP_flu_infection = factor(flu),
    
    # Covariates - Demographics (baseline, _0w suffix)
    X_age_0w = as.numeric(age),
    
    # Covariates - Baseline HAI titer (baseline measurement, _0w suffix)
    X_hai_titer_0w = as.numeric(prevax.B.Brisbane),
    X_hai_40plus_0w = factor(ifelse(X_hai_titer_0w >= 40, 1, 0)),
    
    # Secondary outcomes - HAI titers and vaccine efficacy measures
    YS_hai_titer_4w = as.numeric(postvax.B.Brisbane),
    
    # Calculate fold rise in HAI titer (secondary outcome)
    YS_hai_fold_rise_4w = ifelse(
      !is.na(X_hai_titer_0w) & !is.na(YS_hai_titer_4w) & X_hai_titer_0w > 0,
      YS_hai_titer_4w / X_hai_titer_0w,
      NA_real_
    ),
    
    # Binary indicators for HAI titer thresholds (secondary outcomes)
    YS_hai_40plus_4w = factor(ifelse(YS_hai_titer_4w >= 40, 1, 0)),
    YS_hai_4fold_rise_4w = factor(ifelse(YS_hai_fold_rise_4w >= 4, 1, 0)),
    
    # Covariates - Study logistics (baseline, _0w suffix)
    X_days_vax_to_blood_0w = as.numeric(as.Date(postvax.date) - as.Date(vaccine.date)),
    
    # Baseline HAI titer as covariate (important confounder)
    X_hai_log2_0w = log2(pmax(X_hai_titer_0w, 5)) # log2 transform, setting <10 to 5
  ) %>%
  select(Treatment, starts_with("YP_"), starts_with("YS_"), starts_with("X_"))
```

# Trial 41
## Load Data
```{r}
df41 = medicaldata::licorice_gargle
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
df41_final = df41 %>% 
  rename(
    ## treatment
    Treatment            = treat,

    ## baseline covariates (_0h = pre‐op hour 0)
    X_gender_0h          = preOp_gender,
    X_ASA_0h             = preOp_asa,
    X_BMI_0h             = preOp_calcBMI,
    X_age_0h             = preOp_age,
    X_Mallampati_0h      = preOp_mallampati,
    X_smoking_0h         = preOp_smoking,
    X_painPreOp_0h       = preOp_pain,
    X_surgerySize_0h     = intraOp_surgerySize,

    ## raw sore‐throat scores (0–10)
    raw_throat_30min     = pacu30min_throatPain,
    raw_throat_90min     = pacu90min_throatPain,
    raw_throat_4h        = postOp4hour_throatPain,
    raw_throat_POD1      = pod1am_throatPain,

    ## raw swallow‐pain score (0–10)
    raw_swallow_30min    = pacu30min_swallowPain,

    ## raw cough severity (0–3)
    raw_cough_extub_0min = extubation_cough,
    raw_cough_30min      = pacu30min_cough,
    raw_cough_90min      = pacu90min_cough,
    raw_cough_4h         = postOp4hour_cough,
    raw_cough_POD1       = pod1am_cough
  ) %>%

  # 2. Relevel Treatment (Sugar = reference)
  mutate(
    Treatment = factor(Treatment,
                       levels = c(0,1),
                       labels = c("Sugar","Licorice")) %>%
                relevel(ref = "Sugar")
  ) %>%

  # 3. Derive incidence flags (YP_) and ordered severity (YS_)
  mutate(
    # Primary incidence at rest
    YP_throat_30min    = factor(if_else(raw_throat_30min  > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YP_throat_90min    = factor(if_else(raw_throat_90min  > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YP_throat_4h       = factor(if_else(raw_throat_4h     > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),

    # Secondary incidence: rest at POD1 & swallowing at 30 min
    YS_throat_1d     = factor(if_else(raw_throat_POD1   > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YS_swallow_30min   = factor(if_else(raw_swallow_30min > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),

    # Coughing incidence at five times
    YS_cough_extub_0min= factor(if_else(raw_cough_extub_0min > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YS_cough_30min     = factor(if_else(raw_cough_30min      > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YS_cough_90min     = factor(if_else(raw_cough_90min      > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YS_cough_4h        = factor(if_else(raw_cough_4h         > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),
    YS_cough_1d      = factor(if_else(raw_cough_POD1       > 0, "yes","no"),
                                levels=c("no","yes")),

    # Ordered‐factor severity for mixed‐effects / ordinal models
    YS_throat_30min    = factor(raw_throat_30min, levels=0:10, ordered=TRUE),
    YS_throat_90min    = factor(raw_throat_90min, levels=0:10, ordered=TRUE),
    YS_throat_4h       = factor(raw_throat_4h,    levels=0:10, ordered=TRUE),
    YS_throat_POD1     = factor(raw_throat_POD1,  levels=0:10, ordered=TRUE),
    YS_swallow_30min   = factor(raw_swallow_30min,levels=0:10, ordered=TRUE),

    YS_cough_extub_0min= factor(raw_cough_extub_0min,
                                levels=0:3,
                                labels=c("none","mild","moderate","severe"),
                                ordered=TRUE),
    YS_cough_30min     = factor(raw_cough_30min,
                                levels=0:3,
                                labels=c("none","mild","moderate","severe"),
                                ordered=TRUE),
    YS_cough_90min     = factor(raw_cough_90min,
                                levels=0:3,
                                labels=c("none","mild","moderate","severe"),
                                ordered=TRUE),
    YS_cough_4h        = factor(raw_cough_4h,
                                levels=0:3,
                                labels=c("none","mild","moderate","severe"),
                                ordered=TRUE),
    YS_cough_POD1      = factor(raw_cough_POD1,
                                levels=0:3,
                                labels=c("none","mild","moderate","severe"),
                                ordered=TRUE)
  ) %>%

  # 4. Factorize baseline covariates
  mutate(
    across(
      c(X_gender_0h, X_ASA_0h, X_Mallampati_0h,
        X_smoking_0h, X_painPreOp_0h, X_surgerySize_0h),
      as.factor
    )
  ) %>%

  # 5. Clean up raw_ columns and reorder
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```

```{r}
  )
primaries = c("fruit","veg","noncalbev", "soda", "bottledwater", "seltzerwater")

# 5. Helper function to map raw names → cleaned names
rename_timepoint = function(nms) {
  out = nms

  # – Visit 2 (_post → pre_YP/_YS_<var>_8w)
  is_v2 = str_ends(nms, "_pre")
  v2_vars = str_remove(nms[is_v2], "_pre")
  out[is_v2] = if_else(
    v2_vars %in% primaries,
    paste0("X_", v2_vars, "_8w"),
    paste0("X_", v2_vars, "_8w")
  )

  # – Visit 3 (_change → YP_delta/_YS_delta_<var>_24w)
  is_chg = str_ends(nms, "_change")
  chg_vars = str_remove(nms[is_chg], "_change")
  out[is_chg] = if_else(
    chg_vars %in% primaries,
    paste0("YP_delta_", chg_vars, "_24w"),
    paste0("YS_delta_", chg_vars, "_24w")
  )

  out
}

# 6. Apply renaming to all _pre, _post, _change columns
df45_final = df45_final %>%
  rename_with(.fn = Vectorize(rename_timepoint))

# 7. Reorder: Treatment, all YP_, all YS_, then all X_
df45_final = df45_final %>%
  select(
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  ) %>% 
  select(
        -X_percentfat_8w,
    -YS_delta_percentfat_24w,
    -X_bmi_cat_8w,
    -X_ssb_8w,
    -YS_delta_ssb_24w,
    -X_kg_8w,
    -YS_delta_kg_24w,
    -X_ffm_8w,
    -YS_delta_ffm_24w,
    -X_noncalbev_8w,
    -X_ed_minus_8w,
    -X_ed_fv_minus_8w,
    -X_soda_ds_minus_8w,
    -X_covid_present_0w
  )
```

```{r}
vitals = list(

  "RR_"      = "resp_rate",

)

    new_name = if(t == "0") {
      paste0("X_", metric, "_0h")

      paste0("YS_", metric, "_", t, "h")
    } else {
```

# Trial 50
## Load Data

```{r}
df50 = survival::cgd
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
# Step 1: Create baseline data (enum = 1 contains baseline characteristics)
# Step 1: Create baseline data (enum = 1 contains baseline characteristics)
baseline_data = df50 %>%
  filter(enum == 1) %>%
  select(id, center, random, treat, sex, age, height, weight, inherit, 
         steroids, propylac, hos.cat) %>%
  # Rename treatment variable
  rename(Treatment = treat) %>%
  # Factor Treatment with placebo as reference
  mutate(Treatment = factor(Treatment, levels = c("placebo", "rIFN-g"),
                            labels = c("Placebo", "rIFN-g"))) %>%
  # Factor other categorical/binary variables
  mutate(
    X_sex_0w = factor(sex),
    X_inherit_0w = factor(inherit),
    X_steroids_0w = factor(steroids),
    X_propylac_0w = factor(propylac),
    X_hos_cat_0w = factor(hos.cat),
    X_center_0w = factor(center),
    X_age_0w = age,
    X_height_0w = height,
    X_weight_0w = weight
  ) %>%
  select(-sex, -inherit, -steroids, -propylac, -hos.cat, -center, -age, -height, -weight, -random)

# Step 2: Create primary outcome - time to first serious infection (using proper time suffix)
primary_outcome = df50 %>%
  arrange(id, enum) %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  summarise(
    # Time to first event or censoring (in days, so use _d suffix)
    YP_time_to_first_infection = first(tstop),
    # Event indicator for first infection
    YP_first_infection_event = factor(first(status)),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

# Step 3: Create secondary outcomes
# YS_1: Total number of serious infections
secondary_outcomes = df50 %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  summarise(
    YS_total_serious_infections = sum(status),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

# Step 5: Combine all data
df50_final = baseline_data %>%
  left_join(primary_outcome, by = "id") %>%
  left_join(secondary_outcomes, by = "id") %>%
  # Remove ID column as requested
  select(-id) %>%
  # Reorder columns: Treatment first, then YP_, YS_, X_ variables
  select(Treatment, 
         starts_with("YP_"), 
         starts_with("YS_"), 
         starts_with("X_"))
```

```{r}
    YS_diet_diversity_24m            = rowSums(select(., matches("^e[1-7]$")), na.rm = TRUE),
    YS_caregiver_child_interaction_24m = rowMeans(select(., matches("^MICS_.*_sb2$")), na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = factor(Treatment, levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("Usual Care", "Early Childhood Development"))
  ) %>%
  select(
    ClusterID,
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YP_"),  # none here but placeholder
    starts_with("post_YP_"), # none here but placeholder
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )

# Convert specified variables to factors and standardize binary factor levels
dfc1_final = dfc1_final %>% 
  mutate(
    across(c(YP_stunting_24m, X_sex_0m, X_bornearly_0m, X_mother_age_cat_0m, 
             X_father_primary_0m, X_mother_primary_0m), as_factor),
    # Standardize binary factors to have consistent 0,1 levels
    across(where(is.factor), ~ if(length(levels(.)) == 2) {
      # Convert to 0,1 regardless of original levels
      factor(as.numeric(.) - 1, levels = c("0", "1"))
    } else {
      .  # Keep multi-level factors unchanged
    })
  )

# 3. Cluster-level aggregation with automatic detection of factor types
dfc1_cluster = dfc1_final %>%
  group_by(ClusterID, Treatment) %>%
  reframe(
    n_participants = n(),
    
    # Co-primary outcomes
    YP_stunting_24m        = {result = mean(as.numeric(as.character(YP_stunting_24m)), na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YP_cog_composite_24m   = {result = mean(YP_cog_composite_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YP_lang_composite_24m  = {result = mean(YP_lang_composite_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YP_motor_composite_24m = {result = mean(YP_motor_composite_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YP_se_composite_24m    = {result = mean(YP_se_composite_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YP_ab_composite_24m    = {result = mean(YP_ab_composite_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    
    # Secondary outcomes
    YS_haz06_24m                       = {result = mean(YS_haz06_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YS_diet_diversity_24m              = {result = mean(YS_diet_diversity_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    YS_caregiver_child_interaction_24m = {result = mean(YS_caregiver_child_interaction_24m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    
    # Baseline numeric covariates
    X_age_0m             = {result = mean(X_age_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    X_hh_members_cat_0m     = {result = mean(X_hh_members_cat_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    X_wealth_quintile_0m    = {result = mean(X_wealth_quintile_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    X_distance_0m           = {result = mean(X_distance_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    X_cluster_population_0m = {result = mean(X_cluster_population_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    X_haz_0m             = {result = mean(X_haz_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    X_waz_0m             = {result = mean(X_waz_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},

    X_SRQ_0m             = {result = mean(X_SRQ_0m, na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},
    
    # Baseline factor covariates

    X_bornearly_0m        = {result = mean(as.numeric(as.character(X_bornearly_0m)), na.rm = TRUE); ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)},

  ) %>%
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
# 2. Individual-level cleaning & renaming
dfc2_final = dfc2 %>%
  # 2a. Derive Treatment and keep Cluster ID
  mutate(
    ClusterID   = Code_HC,
    Treatment = factor(case_when(

    X_Weight_0w    = Weight,     # baseline weight

    X_HC_Location_0w = factor(Locat_HC)
  )

# 3. Prefix FU1–FU22 variables as pre_YS_, preserving the "_FU#" suffix
dfc2_final = dfc2_final %>%
  rename_with(
    .cols = matches("_FU\\d+$"),
    .fn   = ~ paste0("pre_YS_", .)
  )

# 4. Prefix other pre-delivery repeated measures as pre_YS_
dfc2_final = dfc2_final %>%
  rename_with(
    .cols = matches("^(GA_\\d+_wgt$|Test_screen\\d+$|Diag_.*$|FBS_.*Screen$|GPP_.*$)"),
    .fn   = ~ paste0("pre_YS_", .)
  )

# 5. Prefix postpartum measures as post_YS_
dfc2_final = dfc2_final %>%
  rename_with(
    .cols = matches("^(Retest_PP$|Test_PP\\d+$|DM_PP$|Res_FBS_PP\\d+$|Res_HGPO_PP$)"),
    .fn   = ~ paste0("post_YS_", .)
  )

# 6. Rename one-off secondary outcomes
dfc2_final = dfc2_final %>%
  mutate(
    YS_GW_fin         = GW_fin,
    YS_Term           = Term,
    YS_Mode_del       = Mode_del,
    YS_Comp_del       = Comp_del,
    YS_Comp_Cat_del   = Comp_Cat_del,
    YS_Comp_NN        = Comp_NN,
    YS_Comp_Cat_NN    = Comp_Cat_NN,
    YS_APGAR1         = APGAR1,
    YS_APGAR2         = APGAR2,
    across(c(pre_YS_Test_screen2, pre_YS_Diag_FBS, pre_YS_Diag_HGPO1, 
             pre_YS_Diag_HGPO2, pre_YS_Place_FU1, pre_YS_Tx_FU1, pre_YS_Place_FU2, 
             pre_YS_Tx_FU2, pre_YS_Place_FU3, pre_YS_Tx_FU3, pre_YS_Place_FU4, pre_YS_Tx_FU4, 
             pre_YS_Place_FU5, pre_YS_Tx_FU5, pre_YS_Place_FU6, pre_YS_Tx_FU6,
              pre_YS_Tx_FU7, pre_YS_Place_FU8, pre_YS_Tx_FU8,
             pre_YS_Place_FU9, pre_YS_Tx_FU9, pre_YS_Place_FU10, pre_YS_Tx_FU10,
             pre_YS_Place_FU11, pre_YS_Tx_FU11, pre_YS_Place_FU12, pre_YS_Tx_FU12,
             pre_YS_Place_FU13, pre_YS_Tx_FU13, pre_YS_Place_FU14, pre_YS_Tx_FU14,
             pre_YS_Place_FU15, pre_YS_Tx_FU15, pre_YS_Place_FU16, pre_YS_Tx_FU16,
             pre_YS_Place_FU17, pre_YS_Tx_FU17, pre_YS_Place_FU18, pre_YS_Tx_FU18,
             pre_YS_Place_FU19, pre_YS_Tx_FU19, pre_YS_Place_FU20, pre_YS_Tx_FU20,
             pre_YS_Place_FU21, pre_YS_Tx_FU21, pre_YS_Place_FU22, pre_YS_Tx_FU22,
             post_YS_DM_PP, post_YS_Test_PP2, post_YS_Test_PP1, post_YS_Retest_PP), as_factor)
  )

# 7. Reorder columns: Treatment, Cluster, then YP_, pre_YS_, post_YS_, X_
dfc2_final = dfc2_final %>%
  select(
    ClusterID,
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YS_"),
    starts_with("post_YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )

# Convert binary factors to have proper factor structure and standardize levels
dfc2_final = dfc2_final %>% 
  mutate(
    # Convert specified variables to factors first
    X_Resid_0w     = factor(X_Resid_0w),      # baseline residence
    X_GDM_ACDT_0w     = factor(X_GDM_ACDT_0w),   # history of GDM
    X_MACRO_ACDT_0w   = factor(X_MACRO_ACDT_0w), # history of macrosomia
    # Standardize binary factors to have consistent 0,1 levels
    across(where(is.factor), ~ if(length(levels(.)) == 2) {
      # Convert to 0,1 regardless of original levels
      factor(as.numeric(.) - 1, levels = c("0", "1"))
    } else {
      .  # Keep multi-level factors unchanged
    })
  )

# 8. Create cluster-level summary with proper aggregation rules
dfc2_cluster = dfc2_final %>%
  group_by(ClusterID) %>%
  reframe(
    n_participants = n(),
    Treatment = first(Treatment),
    across(
      starts_with(c("YP_", "pre_YS_", "post_YS_", "X_")),
      ~ if (is.numeric(.x)) {
          # Numeric variables: use mean
          result = mean(.x, na.rm = TRUE)
          ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)
        } else if (is.factor(.x) && length(levels(.x)) == 2) {
          # Binary factors with 0,1 levels: convert to numeric and take mean (gives proportion)
          result = mean(as.numeric(as.character(.x)), na.rm = TRUE)
          ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)
        } else if (is.factor(.x)) {
          # Factors with 3+ levels: use Mode, keep as factor
          mode_result = DescTools::Mode(.x, na.rm = TRUE)
          # Ensure we return a factor with the same levels
          factor(mode_result, levels = levels(.x))
        } else {
          # Fallback: convert to numeric and take mean
          result = mean(as.numeric(.x), na.rm = TRUE)
          ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)
        }
    )
  ) %>% 
  select(
    ClusterID,
    Treatment,
    n_participants,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YS_"),
    starts_with("post_YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```

```{r}
  rename(
    post_YP_ew_raw_G1 = ew_raw.G1,
    post_YP_lw_ws_G1  = lw_ws.G1,
    post_YP_ap_ws_G1  = ap_ws.G1
  ) %>%
  rename(
    YS_dotP_biasG_5m       = dotP_biasG.2,
    YS_fb_p2_percCorr_5m   = fb_p2_percCorr.2,
    YS_ravens_sum_score_5m = ravens_sum_score.2,
    YS_RCN_MeanTime_R_5m   = RCN_MeanTime_R.2,
    YS_rdots_rt_mean_5m    = rdots_rt_mean.2,
    YP_EF3_RT_5m           = EF3_RT.2,
    X_EF2_perccorr_0m     = EF2_perccorr,
    YP_EF3_perccorr_5m     = EF3_perccorr.2
  ) %>%
  rename(
    X_amy_1r_0m   = amy_1r,
    X_amy_2r_0m   = amy_2r,
    X_amy_3r_0m   = amy_3r,
    X_cort_1r_0m  = cort_1r,
    X_cort_2r_0m  = cort_2r,
    X_cort_3r_0m  = cort_3r,
    YS_amy_1r_5m   = amy_1r.2,
    YS_amy_2r_5m   = amy_2r.2,
    YS_amy_3r_5m   = amy_3r.2,
    YS_cort_1r_5m  = cort_1r.2,
    YS_cort_2r_5m  = cort_2r.2,
    YS_cort_3r_5m  = cort_3r.2
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    X_AgeMonths_0m    = AGE,
    X_Sex_0m             = factor(Sex),
    X_ParentEd__0m      = factor(ParentEd_R),
    X_FreeReduced_0m   = FreeReduced_R,
    X_pv_sum_0m = pv_sum,
  ) %>%
  rename(
    X_Time1_h_0m = Time1_h,
    X_Time2_h_0m = Time2_h,
    X_Time3_h_0m = Time3_h,

# Standardize binary factors to have consistent 0,1 levels
dfc5_final = dfc5_final %>% 
  mutate(
    # Standardize binary factors to have consistent 0,1 levels
    across(where(is.factor), ~ if(length(levels(.)) == 2) {
      # Convert to 0,1 regardless of original levels
      factor(as.numeric(.) - 1, levels = c("0", "1"))
    } else {
      .  # Keep multi-level factors unchanged
    })
  )

# 13. Aggregate to cluster level with automatic detection and proper NA/NaN handling
dfc5_cluster = dfc5_final %>%
  group_by(ClusterID) %>%
  reframe(
    Treatment = first(Treatment),
    n_participants = n(),
    across(
      starts_with(c("YP_", "post_YP_", "YS_", "X_")),
      ~ if (is.numeric(.x)) {
          # Numeric variables: use mean with proper NA handling
          if(all(is.na(.x))) NA_real_ else {
            result = mean(.x, na.rm = TRUE)
            ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)
          }
        } else if (is.factor(.x) && length(levels(.x)) == 2) {
          # Binary factors with 0,1 levels: convert to numeric and take mean (gives proportion)
          if(all(is.na(.x))) NA_real_ else {
            result = mean(as.numeric(as.character(.x)), na.rm = TRUE)
            ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)
          }
        } else if (is.factor(.x) && length(levels(.x)) >= 3) {
          # Multi-level factors: use Mode, keep as factor
          mode_result = DescTools::Mode(.x, na.rm = TRUE)
          factor(mode_result, levels = levels(.x))
        } else {
          # Fallback: convert to numeric and take mean
          if(all(is.na(.x))) NA_real_ else {
            result = mean(as.numeric(.x), na.rm = TRUE)
            ifelse(is.nan(result), NA, result)
          }
        }
    )
  ) %>% 
  select(ClusterID, Treatment, n_participants,
               starts_with("YP"),
               starts_with("post_YP"),
               starts_with("YS"),
               starts_with("X"))
```

# Cluster Trial 6
## Load Data
```{r}
dfc6 = read_xlsx("raw_data/Clustered_RCT/6/6.xlsx", na=c("."))
```

## Cleaning
```{r}
dfc6_final = dfc6 %>% 
  rename(
    Treatment = Stim,               # 1 = Emotional video, 2 = Assessment
    ClusterID = Gruppe              # teaching cluster of 10–12 students
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Treatment = factor(Treatment,
                       levels = c(2, 1),
                       labels = c("Assessment", "EmotionalVideo")),
    Treatment = relevel(Treatment, ref = "Assessment"),
    ClusterID = factor(ClusterID)
  ) %>%
  # Primary outcomes (depth & rate at 1-week, T2)
  rename(
    YP_depth_1w = mDT_mm2,          # mean compression depth (T2)
    YP_rate_1w  = mFreq2            # mean compression rate  (T2)
  ) %>%
  # Baseline (T1) → covariates
  rename(
    X_depth_0w = mDT_mm1,           # baseline depth
    X_rate_0w  = mFreq1             # baseline rate
  ) %>%
  # 6-month follow-up (T3) → post-YP
  rename(
    post_YP_depth_6m = mDT_mm3,     # depth 6 m
    post_YP_rate_6m  = mFreq3       # rate  6 m
  ) %>%
  # Key secondary quality endpoints
  rename(
    YS_depthPctOK_1w = K_DTk2_percent,   # % comps correct depth, T2
    YS_rateQual_1w   = mFreq2_korr2,     # 0/1/2 quality code, T2
    YS_depthPctOK_6m = K_DTk3_percent,   # % comps correct depth, T3
    YS_rateQual_6m   = mFreq3_korr3      # 0/1/2 quality code, T3
  ) %>%
  rename(
    X_age_0y                = Age,   # age in yrs
    X_sex_0d                = Sex,   # 1 = ♀, 2 = ♂
    X_priorMedKnow_0d       = Vorw   # 1 = without, 2 = with
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    X_sex_0d          = factor(X_sex_0d, levels = c(1, 2),
                               labels = c("Female", "Male")),
    X_priorMedKnow_0d = factor(X_priorMedKnow_0d, levels = c(1, 2),
                               labels = c("No", "Yes"))
  ) %>%
  # character → factor
  mutate(across(where(is.character) &
                  !starts_with("YP_") & !starts_with("YS_"),
                factor)) %>%
  # numeric 0/1 or 2-level → factor
  {
    num = names(.)[sapply(., is.numeric)]
    bin = num[sapply(.[num], \(x) n_distinct(na.omit(x)) == 2)]
    mutate(., across(all_of(bin), factor))
  } %>%
  select(
    ClusterID,
    Treatment,
    starts_with("YP_"),
    starts_with("pre_YP_"),
    starts_with("post_YP_"),
    starts_with("YS_"),
    starts_with("X_")
  )
```
